review: Around two weeks ago I was having unbearable pain in my molars, the pain was so severe that I was unable to even drink water properly. I searched for dentists nearby my residence & I am really thankful that I came across Dr. Renu Sharma ma'm. She patiently listened to my problem over phone & keeping my suffering into her account, even in this situation of pandemic she agreed to open her clinic & called me for treatment the very next day. It is only actually because of her very treatment that I so very soon recovered from my pain and was actually able to eat properly which I was unable to do previously due to the pain in my teeth. Bighearted thanks to you ma'm, thank you for bringing back my smileüôè

It was the first time where i satisfied, before this i went to other dental clinics but i didn't get that treatment which i need. I impressed by way of explaining solutions of problems, way of treatment was awesome and the way of communication with client by the staff got me feel good. When i visited  there RCT & other treatments given by Mam & i realized that she has very deep knowledge in her dentist field.  I would suggest to those people who are reading my feedback, believe me when you visit once there, you will avoid to visit any other place for treatment.
In last i would like to say Dant Suraksha Dental care *** ** *** **** ****** ****** *** Thank you mam and there staff. üôèüèªüôèüèªüôèüèª

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a failed RCT and had severe infection at the base of my tooth. I was recommended tooth extraction and implant by my previous doctor. But Dr. Renu saved my tooth. It was a painless procedure.  
I highly recommend her.

Below are the key point which i liked about the Dental clinic 
1* ** *********** ************ ** ********** 
2) good hygiene in clinic
3) Doctor was available on prescribed time . I didn't need to wait for the long time for my turn . Proper time management.
4) it has been almost 4 months and no issue felt in my RCT overall good experience.

I was really satisfied with my experience.  Dr. Renu explained all the procedures and available options in detail. My RCT was mostly painless. As per my experience I would highly recommend Dr Renu to everyone for RCT. Really thankful for ur services.
Regards, Tripti.

Dr. Renu Sharma is a very talented and humble person. She is very much focused to treat the patient and give a painless experience to solve their problem. I will definitely recommend my family and friends and everyone reading this review to get their teeth problem checked with Dr. Renu Sharma.

Dr. Renu Sharma is a responsible *** ******* ******** I have 100% trust on her dental treatments. I am very much satisfied with her treatments which was beyond my expectations. Thank you Dr. Renu and the staff once again.
The service that i receive from dr renu is excellent...warm experience...must visit...best doctor in dilshad garden ..must visitüëçüëç
I had always been worried about my treatment for cavities but she was very humble and patient while explaining the treatment. The treatment went perfect and I would highly recommend her to everyone.
reply_text: Thankyou so much forcyour genuine feedback

review:
Dr Renu seems like a very experienced person in her field.Everything was fine but I think the treatment post procedure can be explained more systematically and clearly..
Also communication regarding a junior doctor doing your procedure would be appreciated pre procedure.
Dr. renu seems very skilled and will definitely leave you satisfied after your session with her..
